title: Captain America and the Falcon: The Swine
description: The King keeps Cap's quests coming with menaces from deep in space and deeper in the human soul Even the evil of the Red Skull might pale before the fearsome Bio-Fanatic Plus: Magneto and a rarely seen batch of evil mutants Featuring the Falcon and Nick Fury of S. H. I. E. L. D. Collects Captain America #206-214, Annual 3-4.
author: Jack Kirby
